arts.ttl: Kabongo Tshimanga effort enough as Swindon edge former side Chesterfield
arts.sum: Tshimanga was fouled by visiting goalkeeper Ryan Boot in the 61st minute and stepped up to successfully convert the resulting penalty.

Swindon's 1-0 defeat to Harrogate last weekend ended five games without defeat. Chesterfield's 3-1 defeat to Walsall was their second defeat in three games. Swindon Town have failed to win any of th...
